casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

January 22, 2010

[Cite as 01/22/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-160.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2009-1069. Barberton v. Jenney.

Summit App. No. 24423, 2009-Ohio-1985. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Summit County. Upon consideration of the joint motion of appellee and amicus curiae Ohio Attorney General to participate in oral argument scheduled for February 17, 2010,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted, and amicus curiae shall share the time allotted to appellee.
